name: rocketh-doc
description: can generate doc from rocketh deployments and provided template

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsup --publicDir --entry src/index.ts --entry src/cli.ts --dts --format esm,cjs
scripts.dev: rimraf dist && tsup --publicDir --entry src/index.ts --entry src/cli.ts --dts --format esm,cjs --watch
